description:
It is the 25th century. The dark lord has 'infected' history with time-devices that could damage history beyond repair. Flint and his father lived in the prehistorics when they got turned into fossils. They are discovered and Flint gets turned back to his original state. With the help of his father, a boy Tony and a girl Sara he has to travel through time to bring the time-devices back to the land of time so history will be saved.

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Detective
tags.description: Features a character who investigates and solves crimes.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Primarily Child Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters below a high school age.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/805696106420060160) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/78JmbZfna6DOfhSoxccZZw)

Masuda is perhaps best known as the composer of the 2002 hit anime series [Naruto](https://anilist.co/anime/20/) where he combined traditional instruments like the shamisen and shakuhachi together with guitar, drums, bass, piano and other keyboard instruments along with chanting. Masuda also created the scores for titles such as [Mushishi](https://anilist.co/anime/457/), [Kamisama Kiss](https://anilist.co/anime/14713/) and [Ghost Hunt](https://anilist.co/anime/1571/).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/福冨博) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hiroshi_Fukutomi)

Originating from [Shin-Ei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/247/)

Married to animator [Kazuko Fukutomi](https://anilist.co/staff/157057/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Sunma47) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/三間雅文)

One of the industry's most prolific sound directors, having worked on more than 300 productions.

After having graduated college, Mima joined Magic Capsule, a sound production company ran by his relative [Susumu Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/120062/). In 1986, he debuted as a sound director on [MD Geist](https://anilist.co/anime/1285/MD-Geist/). He left Magic Capsule in 1996, and later joined Techno Sound. In 2004, he became the studio's representative director.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/奥田誠治_(アニメーション演出家%29)

Seiji Okuda is a veteran anime director. He established Project Team Eikyuukikan, a collaboration of several animators, which was disbanded by him in October 2009. He continues to work freelance, mostly as storyboarder. He is also a member of the JAniCA.

_Note: Not to be confused with the producer [Seiji Okuda](https://anilist.co/staff/219343/)._

[Website](https://www.maocloud.net/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/MaoCloud) |  [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/maomaowsan/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/MaoCloud)

Multi-talented freelance artist who specialized in depicting nature, such as clouds and waves.

After graduating from high school, he joined [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/), and worked under [Keiichirou Kimura](https://anilist.co/staff/168326/). Later joined Madhouse and was one of the studio's leading animators during its early days together with [Akio Sugino](https://anilist.co/staff/103064/) and [Yoshiaki Kawajiri](https://anilist.co/staff/100812/).

Jeffrey Alan Winkless was an American film and voice actor and music composer. He was born in Springfield, Massachusetts. One of his younger brothers, Daniel Owen Winkless, worked with him on The Banana Splits Adventure Hour. He has done voice-overs for several anime titles including Doomed Megalopolis, Space Adventure Cobra, Vampire Hunter D, Crying Freeman and Lily C.A.T..  Winkless died of a brain tumor on June 26, 2006.

Michael McConnohie is an American voice actor, writer and director who has provided many voice roles in movies, anime, and video games. He and fellow actress Melodee Spevack run a production company called VoxWorks. Some of his major works include the Narrator on Bobobo-bo Bo-bobo and Hunter x Hunter, Azulongmon in Digimon, Gork in Masked Rider, Keiichi Ikari in Paranoia Agent, Rolf Emerson in Robotech, Manzou the Saw in Samurai Champloo, Cosmos and Tracks in Transformers, Hot Shot / Ironhide in Transformers: Robots in Disguise, D in Vampire Hunter D, Chief Inquisitor Margulis in Xenosaga and Charles zi Britannia in Code Geass.

(Source: Wikipedia)

Michael Sorich is an American actor, writer and director active since 1977. He is currently known for his voice roles in the popular anime series Bleach.
(Source: Wikipedia)

Rafael Antonio "Tony" Olivier is a Puerto Rican-born American voice actor best known for voicing Rick Hunter from Robotech, Lancer from Fate/stay night, and Arsène Lupin III from Lupin the Third. He helped produce the live action shows Mighty Morphin Power Rangers and VR Troopers.
Thomas Halperin Wyner is an English-American voice actor for anime series who usually gets tough guy or villain roles. He is also a producer, director, and writer.
